title: Status of fly ash-derived sustainable nanomaterials for batteries and supercapacitors
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00354C, Review Article
Farwa Mushtaq, Lu Wang, Haifeng Tu, Jian Wang, Yuchen Wang, Ao Sun, Fengyi Zhu, Mingchao Wang, Yongyi Zhang, Meinan Liu
The progress in diverse carbon- and silicon-based nanomaterials prepared from various ash types are discussed and their application in supercapacitors and batteries are summarized.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
